snippet: The conductor Lorin Maazel, 84, will give up his directorship of the Munich Philharmonic and won’t take new professional engagements for the upcoming season.
abstract: The conductor Lorin Maazel, 84, will give up his directorship of the Munich Philharmonic and won’t take new professional engagements for the upcoming season.

headline.main: Maazel to Slow Down, on Doctors' Orders
headline.print_headline: Maazel to Slow Down On Doctors’ Orders
